example.parse: (TOP (S (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG فِكرَة))) (NP-VOC (PRT (VOC_PART يا)) (NOUN_PROP هِند)) (VP (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN الكَلام)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON اللِّى)) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_2FS اِنتِ)) (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG كَتبَة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (PRON_3MS ُه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2))))))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ جَمِيل) (NP-ADV (ADJ قَوِى))))))
